name: Dinari DEFI
description: The Dinari DEFI dShares token (DEFI.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in the Global X Decentralized Finance ETF (DEFI), which focuses on companies driving innovation in decentralized finance, blockchain technology, and cryptocurrency infrastructure. Each DEFI.d token is fully backed by a corresponding DEFI ETF share securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, DEFI.d provides investors with seamless access to the growing DeFi sector, enabling fractional ownership, 24/7 trading, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
